title: Effigy Mounds National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Effigy Mounds National Monument Ranger / Interpreter Guided Programs      Time: 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: All Hikes/Talks depart from the Visitor Center Fees: No Fee     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/13/2016 to 09/05/2016 Hikes, walks, and talks presented daily.  Call for the day's activities/schedule. View Details      Effigy Mounds National Monument Junior Ranger Program/Hike      Time: 1:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Admission is free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Become a Junior Ranger by completing an activity booklet and going on a 2-mile ranger led hike. View Details      Effigy Mounds National Monument National Park Service Birthday (Founders Day)      Time: 1:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Admission is free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Come celebrate the birthday of the National Park Service with a special program/talk to be held at 1pm.  Call for more information: 563-873-3491 ext. 202 View Details
